intro.description: I'm a computer science graduate from Universidad del Valle de Guatemala, I have a passion for UI/UX design and developing. I also graduated with a specialization in videogames, referring to videogame design and developement, which is my <bold><italics>other</italics></bold> main interest for which I'm the most passionate about.
intro.description2: Let's work together and push your site to a next level with beautiful visuals! I'm open minded and very flexible regarding to design, so we can do whatever is required for you to be satisfied!
